DOC.brief_summary: An age-related decrease muscular strength may detrimental effect muscle fatigue recovery . To date , one study determine effect vary rest interval ( RI ) exercise set active young old woman . They report active young old woman require similar RI set recovery full isokinetic knee extension peak torque ( PT ) . However , unaware publish study compare RI PT recovery young old men . Thus , purpose study compare effect two different RI 's set isokinetic knee extension exercise PT , Total Work ( TW ) untrained young old men .
DOC.brief_title: Isokinetic Testing Protocol Elderly Young Men
DOC.detailed_description: 18 young men ( 24.22 ± 2.58 yr ) 20 old men ( 66.85 ± 4.02 yr ) perform 3 set 10 unilateral isokinetic knee extension repetition 60°/s . The rest interval set 1 2 minute counterbalance across 2 test day , separate minimum 48 hour . The work-to-rest ratio 1:3 1:6 . All subject involve exercise program include resistance exercise within last 6 month . Statistical evaluation data perform use 2x 2 x 3 mixed factor repeat measure ANOVA [ age ( young old ) x rest interval ( 1 2 min ) x set ( 1st , 2nd , 3rd ) ] . Statistical significance set p < 0.05 comparison .
DOC.criteria: Less 75 year Independent History cardiovascular disease Hypertension Orthopedic disease
